idea-plugin.name: FavoriteFolders
idea-plugin.description: Adds favorite folders into FileChooser dialog toolbar.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
v0.0.0.1 - Initial revision.
v0.0.0.2 - Allow to install plugin in all Idea-based products.
v0.0.0.3 - Allow to set custom name to favorite folder (to show in tooltip)
v0.0.0.4 - Add browser button to select custom icon for favorite folder. Small fixes.
